<summary>About me</summary>

[//]: # (You must have a lf before the markdown element when inside a block for it to work: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/29368902/how-can-i-wrap-my-markdown-in-an-html-div)

<div align="left">

```js
/**
 * Represents me.
 * @constructor
 * @param {string} city - Colombo, Sri Lanka.
 * @param {string} languagues - English.
 * @param {string} jobTitle - Frontend Developer.
 * @param {string} specialization - Building full-fledged web applications.
 * @param {string} interests - AI, writing & problem-solving.
 * @param {string} education - BSc CompSci, cardiff metropolitan university.
 * @throws {Punch} To any and all bugs.
 * @returns {Object} Improving the world with quality software.
 */
```

</div>
